channel.title: Matrix Cleaned
channel.description:
[CENTER] [SIZE=6][FONT=Impact][color=black]Matrix[/COLOR][COLOR=red]Cleaned[/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE] [/CENTER]
Nobody has released a clean version of Matrix, so here you go. I removed most content, although I kept some things such as combat, shops, trading, and just the common/basic things. The majority of it is cleaned though. I also didn't really like the action system in Matrix so I went ahead and wrote a new one (based off Hyperion's).
Enjoy!
[IMG]http://puu.sh/5UY33.png[/img]
[URL=http://uppit.com/tbum155g9713/Matrix_Cleaned.zip]Matrix Cleaned @ Uppit [/URL]

item.title: Matrix Cleaned
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“south-park, post:8, topic:537424”][quote author=alexjerta link=topic=656244.msg4392001#msg4392001 date=1387852626]
ummm… When I download this It gives a warning from Google Chrome for Phising…
I’d suggest you guys don’t download this…
[/quote]

Get outta here, please.[/quote]
I find it quite funny that people are now getting shamed for being cautious with what they download.

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix Cleaned
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“south-park, post:6, topic:537424”][quote author=Arcik link=topic=656244.msg4391954#msg4391954 date=1387842299]
This isn’t even “cleaned”.
[/quote]

It’s way cleaner then it was before.[/quote]That doesn’t mean it’s cleaned. If there is content, then it is not cleaned.

Read full topic

[CENTER]
[SIZE=6][FONT=Impact][color=black]Matrix[/COLOR][COLOR=red]Cleaned[/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE]

Nobody has released a clean version of Matrix, so here you go. I removed most content, although I kept some things such as combat, shops, trading, and just the common/basic things. The majority of it is cleaned though. I also didn’t really like the action system in Matrix so I went ahead and wrote a new one (based off Hyperion’s).

Enjoy!

[URL=http://uppit.com/tbum155g9713/Matrix_Cleaned.zip]Matrix Cleaned @ Uppit [/URL]
[/quote]

Pl0x, Add the client & cache <3[/quote]

Just use any 718 client. I’m not uploading cache, it would take like 3 or 4 days (it would probably fail 99% of the time); internet is a pile of poop.
